attributes.action: Listen to a Peoples Vote of No Confidence in this Labour Government
attributes.additional_details: A People’s Vote of No Confidence in the Labour government is essential. Promised reforms in health, housing, and education have stalled or vanished. Economic policy lacks substance, focusing on tax hikes over growth. Immigration remains unmanaged, with failing legal routes and rising irregular entries. Public services are still in crisis, and strikes persist. Labour’s centralisation of power and weak delivery demand accountability. The public must demand urgent change through a vote.
attributes.background: A People’s Vote of No Confidence in the Labour government is vital. With crises mounting and public trust eroding, we cannot wait four more years. This vote lets UK people demand Labour change course and listen. It’s time to hold them accountable.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
